content: a lovely snowflake and easy to make i keep my snowflakes up all winter and it brightens up the dark days you can make this of any regular cotton yarn and a matching hook for a semi-tight stitching when i make one with a 3mm hook the width is around 7cm 2 8in if you want glitter i can recommend a glitter yarn i tried twinkle from scheepjes it might be a bit more difficult to make but the tiny flashes you get are worth it though difficult to catch on a photo **have fun ** p s notice that i have two free snowflake patterns and they match each other pretty well
